note.p: Career: Master of the Charterhouse (1677-1685); Cupbearer to Charles II
Committee appointments include: Committee for improving the English language (1664)
Authority: Name from DNB and Hunter; Altname from index to BR and R; death date from DNB

Notes: The election date is Erskine's re-election date into the Society after the grant of the second charter in April 1663. All Fellows admitted in a two-month window after this charter, until 22 June 1663, are considered Original Fellows. He was previously elected on 14 August 1661 and admitted into the Society on 21 August 1661.
